item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using ChIPseeker and your publication will be featured here. 2019 Gene Regulatory Programs Conferring Phenotypic Identities to Human NK Cells. Cell. 2019 2018 Loss of ADAR1 in tumours overcomes resistance to immune checkpoint blockade. Nature. 2018 A CD4+ T cell population expanded in lupus blood provides B cell help through interleukin-10 and succinate. Nature Medicine. 2018 MIR sequences recruit zinc finger protein ZNF768 to expressed genes.
